sqlMap.select: select SETTLEMENT_ID, META_PRODUCT_ID, TARGET_ID from META_SETTLEMENT where SETTLEMENT_ID = #settlementId#
select count(*) from META_SETTLEMENT where META_PRODUCT_ID = #metaProductId# and BIZ_TYPE=#bizType#
select TARGET_ID from META_SETTLEMENT where META_PRODUCT_ID = #metaProductId# and BIZ_TYPE=#bizType# AND ROWNUM = 1
select * from META_SETTLEMENT where META_PRODUCT_ID = #metaProductId# and BIZ_TYPE=#bizType#
sqlMap.delete: delete from META_SETTLEMENT where META_PRODUCT_ID = #metaProductId# and TARGET_ID = #targetId#
sqlMap.insert:
select META_SETTLEMENT_SEQ.nextVal FROM DUAL
insert into META_SETTLEMENT (SETTLEMENT_ID, META_PRODUCT_ID, TARGET_ID, BIZ_TYPE) values (#settlementId#, #metaProductId#, #targetId#,#bizType#)
